name: Hero Cover
description: Hero sections are used to introduce the product or service. They are the first and primary section of the website. This is a centered hero section with a large title, a subtitle and two buttons.

strings.description: Main title of the hero section
Primary button text of the hero section
Secondary button text of the hero section

images.description: Background image of the hero section

name: Content 4
description: Content columns are used to provide more detailed information about the product or service. This is a two row content section with first paragraph on top, and two in bottom side-by-side.

strings.description: The first paragraph text of the content block.
The second paragraph text of the content block.
The third paragraph text of the content block.

name: Content 6
description: A versatile content block featuring an image and text side by side, with customizable button for action. Ideal for featuring product details, services, or important features.

strings.description: Description text for the content block
Text for the action button in the content block

images.description: Image displayed in the content block

name: Features grid
description: Feature columns are used to highlight the main features of the product or service. This section is a three column grid with two rows.

strings.description: The title for the features grid section
Description for the features grid section

name: Call to action 2
description: Call to action sections are used to encourage users to take an action. This is a call to action section with an action button on the bottom.

strings.description: Main title of the call to action section
Subtitle of the call to action section
Button text of the call to action section

name: Testimonial on Background
description: Testimonial sections are used to show what customers think about the product or service. This section is a centered testimonial.

strings.description: Name of an author, preferably a dummy name
